title: A welcome step by Maharashtra government. Other states please take notes.
selftext:
On December 18, 2024, the Maharashtra State Social Justice and Home departments issued a circular, notifying the availability of safe houses in every district of Maharashtra for inter-faith and inter-caste couple, married or unmarried.Â 

What's your opinion on this?
